title: Ep. 450: Sexy, Expensive & Controversial with Makeup Artist Marcelo Gutierrez
itunes:title: Ep. 450: Sexy, Expensive & Controversial with Makeup Artist Marcelo Gutierrez
description:
Makeup artist and filmmaker Marcelo Gutierrez does sexy, expensive, and sometimes controversial work, but never without sensitivity. Jess talks to him about his serendipitous start in the business, his celebrity clientele (Dua Lipa, Lily-Rose Depp), his influences, and how his identity informs his art.

  • Sponsor links & discount codes: shopmy.us/collections/31511
  • Episode recaps with links: fatmascara.com/blog
